contents:
以上多數建議幫助不少，您能篩選出對您最有幫助的。

不妨我建議糾正英語口音。臺大外文系教授史嘉琳 (Karen Steffen Chung) 說明多聽和練習以英語為母語人講話會有幫助。

Many of the suggestions above are quite helpful. You can probably pick the ones which will help you the most.

May I suggest correcting your English accent. Taiwan University Professor Karen Steffen Chung mentioned listening and practising native speakers' speech regularly will help.

Best of luck.
